p: Glutathione also participates in the GSH/ASC cycle, a series of enzymatic reactions that degrade H 2O 2. APX degrades H 2O 2 using ASC, the other major antioxidant in plants, as cofactor. The oxidized ASC is reduced by monodehydroascorbate reductase (MDHAR) in an NAD(P)H-dependent manner and by dehydroascorbate reductase (DHAR) employing GSH as electron donor. The resulting GSSG is reduced in turn to GSH by GR ( Foyer and Noctor, 2011).
